Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Bratislava Castle, Michael Gate (medieval), Presidential Palace (Grasalkovich), Blue Church (Elizabeth), Old Town.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Sad Jan Ko Krala Park (the oldest public park), Bratislava Forest Park, Danube River banks.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: St. Elizabeth Cathedral (the largest church in Slovakia), Urban Tower, Hlavna historic street.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Botanical Garden of Pavol Jozef Šafárik University, City Park (Mestský Park).

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Old Castle and New Castle (UNESCO heritage), Holy Trinity Square, Open‑air Mining Museum.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Industrial mining lakes (Tajchy) surrounded by forests, Calvary Park.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Kolonad Bridge (functional architecture), Napoleon Bath Building, Balneology Museum.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Spa Island with its lush gardens, City Park.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Imposing Trenčín Castle on the hill, Roman rock carving (dating to 179 AD), Old Jewish synagogue.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Lesopark Brezina forest park surrounding the castle.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: St. James Church (holds the highest wooden altar in the world), Old Town Hall, Pillory.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Green hills surrounding Spiš with panoramic views.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Mariánske Square, Bodatin Castle (at river confluence), Holy Trinity Church.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Sad SNP park, Žilina water dam.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Historic Spišská Sobota district (Gothic houses and Renaissance), St. Egidius Church.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Gateway to the High Tatras, Aquacity water park (groundwater).

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Nitra Castle, St. Emmeram Cathedral, Zobor Abbey (ruins).
Cities.Green_Spaces: Sihot Park (by the river), Zobor Hill and walking trails.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Town Hall Square (UNESCO), St. Egidius Church, Preserved defensive fortifications.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Bardejovské Kúpele spa resort amidst forests.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Fullerton Hotel (formerly a post office), Merlion Park.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Gardens by the Bay with its giant trees, Flower Dome.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Sri Sen Buda Temple, Sri Mariamman Temple (Hindu), traditional shophouse buildings.

Cities.Green_Spaces: Siloso, Palawan and Tanjong beaches, natural walking trails.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: National Gallery (formerly the Supreme Court), Old Parliament Building, St. Andrew's Cathedral.

Cities.Green_Spaces: National Orchid Garden, ancient rainforest (UNESCO site).

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple, Abdul Ghaffur Mosque, Mustafa Centre.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Small green spaces and community gardens.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Sultan Mosque with golden dome, Malay Heritage Centre (former Sultan's Palace).

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Colorful Peranakan houses, colonial architecture.
Cities.Green_Spaces: East Coast Park stretching along the sea.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Ancient water wheels, Al‑Azm Palace (Tradition Museum), Al‑Nuri Mosque.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Roman theatre (one of the best preserved), basaltic Old Town.
